caption.p: The structure of the flavonoids found in SCST. ( A) The anti-proliferative activity of flavonoids found in SCST in LX-2 cells were tested by MTT assay. ( B) The anti-proliferative activity of the flavonoids found in SCST in LX-2 cells as tested by the MTT assay ( n = 5). Mean values ± SD are presented. ** P < 0.01 versus the control group, * P < 0.05 versus the control group.
